name: transform group
desc: The transform_group module is used to translate, rotate or scale the coordinates any number of input objects.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Transform List
properties.desc: The list of transformation applied to the input objects.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Visibility
properties.desc: The Visibility toggle will turn on or off the visible state of the output objects.
